*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel C. Hirams to Austin, Jul/ 15, 1826. Concerning building a house for Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Harrisburg */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-15-1826">July 15th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir :*/p*
*p*This will inform you that the *person_mentioned*sawyers */person_mentioned*that I calculated to send you, before I returned had engaged another job of sawing, that mite keep them two weeks longer, after which time I will send them on.*/p*
*p*In our calculation of the expence of building, we forgot to calculate the price of shingles, and putting them on. Let me here from you the first oppertunity*/p*
*p*My respects to *person_mentioned*Mj. Burnett*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col S.F Austin*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned* Saml C. Hirams*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
